name: Clickthroo
overview:
Clickthroo is a landing page marketing platform that allows marketers to easily build self-optimizing landing pages (without the need for coding skills or hosting) and then show personalized landing page versions to each visitor.

The platform uses conditional logic rule-sets to allow its users to target the content of landing pages at visitors based on where they have come from, who they are, and what they are looking for.

In addition, Clickthroo offers full A/B testing of landing page variants, bolstered further by its proprietary auto-optimization feature, meaning platform users can be as hand-on (or hands-off) as they wish.

Finally, Clickthroo offers its users a comprehensive list of partner integration’s to expands its functionality further.
